abstract.t: This document defines SIP extensions for session recording to meetthe requirements in the "Requirements for SIP-based Media Recording(SIPREC)" document. In particular, mechanisms to allow SIP elementsto distinguish between the Recording Session and the CommunicationSession. Also a mechanism for a UA to learn that the communicationsession is being recorded is proposed. The Metadata about thesession is not covered by this document. SIP feature tags 'srs','src', and 'recorded' are defined to identify the Session RecordingServer, Session Recording Client, and the presence of recording inthe communication session.
